Buscapè

This website is powered by:

  • Jekyll Static site engine bundled as a ruby gem
  • HTML5 Boilerplate A professional front-end template for building fast, robust, and adaptable web apps
  • Sass CSS3 extension
  • Compass Open-source CSS authoring framework.
  • Respond.js A fast & lightweight polyfill for min/max-width CSS3 Media Queries (for IE 6-8, and more)
  • jQuery (ok, you don't need a link)

Icons courtesy of Glyphicons and PixelGlyph.
